text: Gus Coppens (born February 7, 1955) is a former American football tackle. He played for the New York Giants in 1979. Coppens played college football at UCLA and was drafted by the Los Angeles Rams in the 12th round of the 1978 NFL Draft. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:American football tackles Category:UCLA Bruins football players Category:New York Giants players Category:Los Angeles Express players
title: Gus Coppens
